item.title: Enough Senate Democrats vote with Republicans to break government shutdown impasse
item.description: The Senate passed a key test vote Sunday night on a plan that would reopen the government.

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Senate vote marks step towards ending federal shutdown
item.description: Trump offers more insight into proposal that directs subsidies directly to the American people to pay for health care rather than sending funds insura...

item.title: Hall of Famer Lenny Wilkens, godfather of Seattle basketball, dies at 88
item.description: Wilkens brought his calm and savvy style as a point guard to the sideline.

item.title: Mamdani's effect: Experts predict more millennial, Gen Z candidates will seek office
item.description: Zohran Mamdani's historic election win will likely not be the last time a candidate under 35 will win a major race, political experts said.

item.title: WATCH: US consumer sentiment nears record lows amid government shutdown
item.description: ABC News' Elizabeth Schulze reports on weak financial data raising fresh concerns about the economy.
